Text: Last Updated on October 3, 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
Information Collection & Use
General: Evolution Finance may collect and store information about you and others when you register with Evolution Finance, when you use the Services, when you visit Evolution Finance pages or the pages of Evolution Finance properties (e.g., CardHub.com and WalletHub.com) or the pages of certain Evolution Finance partners, and when you enter promotions or sweepstakes conducted, endorsed, or advertised by Evolution Finance.

Evolution Finance uses information for the following general purposes: providing, maintaining, optimizing, and improving our services, developing new services, enhancing the user experience, customizing the advertising, offers and content you see, fulfilling your product and service requests, research and development, managing your customer relationship with us, providing you customer support, contacting you, and providing reports for our internal and external clients and partners.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Registration: Upon registering with Evolution Finance, personal information such as your name, email address, birth date, gender, or ZIP code may be requested. Certain products and services may ask you for additional information, such as your address, phone number, income, Social Security number, details about the financial products you use, driver’s license number or information about your assets. Some of the personal information we collect when you register, like your Social Security number, is required by the credit bureau to verify your identity so we can fulfill your request for a free credit score and credit report. When requesting your credit report and score on your behalf, we do not do a hard inquiry; rather, we do a soft inquiry of your credit report. We may also collect personal information or other information directly from you through various other forms and places throughout the Services, including "Contact Us" forms, or when you otherwise interact with us to provide or enhance our Services. You are not anonymous to us when you register with Evolution Finance and sign in to our Services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Transactions: Evolution Finance collects information about your transactions with us and some of our partners. This includes billing and payment information and information about your use of our products and service offerings.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: This includes billing and payment information and information about your use of our products and service offerings. We share this information with third parties who perform tasks required to complete purchase transactions (such as fulfilling orders and processing credit card payments).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Special Offers and Updates: We use information we collect in providing the Services, including personal information, to match you with offers for financial products and services. Generally, we will display these offers when you access our Services, but we will occasionally send you information on products, services, special deals, or promotions, by email or other electronic messaging.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Automatically Collected Information: Evolution Finance uses cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to automatically collect and record certain information from the computer, mobile phone, or other device you use to access the Services, including device identifier, technical information about your device, IP address, browser type, browser language, the webpages you request, location information, and the date and time of your request.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Automatically Collected Information: Evolution Finance uses cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to automatically collect and record certain information from the computer, mobile phone, or other device you use to access the Services, including device identifier, technical information about your device, IP address, browser type, browser language, the webpages you request, location information, and the date and time of your request. When we use third-party tools, those third parties may also collect such information. For more information, please see our Cookie Policy.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Registration: Upon registering with Evolution Finance, personal information such as your name, email address, birth date, gender, or ZIP code may be requested. Certain products and services may ask you for additional information, such as your address, phone number, income, Social Security number, details about the financial products you use, driver’s license number or information about your assets. Some of the personal information we collect when you register, like your Social Security number, is required by the credit bureau to verify your identity so we can fulfill your request for a free credit score and credit report.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Location: We may collect and store information about your device's precise location if you enable your computer or mobile device to share it with us. Evolution Finance will not collect your precise location information without your consent.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Location: We may collect and store information about your device's precise location if you enable your computer or mobile device to share it with us. Evolution Finance will not collect your precise location information without your consent. However, we may ask for your consent to use location-enabled services on your device so that we can collect, share and process information about your device's location to enhance our Services and provide better offers to you, using information like GPS or Wi-Fi access point information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may also use information like your IP address or other device identifiers for approximate location information, like your city or state.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Public Content: Your reviews, comments, questions and answers, posts, followers, groups, financial products in your Wallet, businesses and professionals that you have done business with, topics and users you follow, profile information (including your name), and any other information that you post to the Service are meant for public consumption.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Public Content: Your reviews, comments, questions and answers, posts, followers, groups, financial products in your Wallet, businesses and professionals that you have done business with, topics and users you follow, profile information (including your name), and any other information that you post to the Service are meant for public consumption. We may display this content on the Service, collect and store it, and further distribute it to a wider audience through third party sites and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Other Users: We receive information about you from other users through their use of the Service, such as when they follow you, comment on your posts, ask you questions, mention you, or send you messages.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Messages: If you exchange messages with others through the Service, we may store these messages in order to deliver them and allow you to manage them. If you send information from the Service to your phone via SMS text message, we may log your phone number, phone carrier, and the date and time that the message was processed.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: When you send email or other communications to Evolution Finance, we may retain those communications in order to process your inquiries, respond to your requests and improve our services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: As part of our credit monitoring service, you may also receive SMS text messages, push alerts on your phone, and emails when there is a credit or savings alert. These alert messages will also be logged.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Other Sites: We offer some of our services on or through other web sites. Personal information that you provide to those sites may be sent to Evolution Finance in order to deliver the service.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You can also connect your Evolution Finance account to your accounts on third party services like Facebook or Twitter, in which case we may collect and store information identifying your account with the third-party service as well as other information from these third-party services that you have given us permission to access (e.g., name, date of birth, profile picture and friends’ birthdays). These features may collect your IP address, which page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly. Social media features and widgets are either hosted by a third party or hosted directly on our site
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We use the information to help you connect and share public content with your friends and followers.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Information Provided by Third Parties about You: Evolution Finance may supplement the information we collect about you with information from third parties in order to enhance our ability to serve you, to tailor our content to you and to offer you opportunities to consider financial products or services that we believe may be of interest to you. This includes, for example, the free credit report and free credit score we may obtain on your behalf when you register for the Service from a credit bureau (e.g., TransUnion). Examples of other sources from which we may collect personal information include our business partners, publicly available sources, data providers, other users, and social media platforms that you use to log into the Services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Service-Related Announcements: We may send you service-related announcements. For instance, if we update our privacy practices or if our service is temporarily suspended for maintenance, we might send you an email.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Push Notifications: If you use our Mobile Applications, we may send you push notifications from time-to-time via our Mobile Application in order to provide or alert you to service-related announcements or information on products, services, special deals, or promotions
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Disclosure & Sharing of Information
Evolution Finance may share information you have provided during use of our Services under the following circumstances:

When you use our Services to obtain offers for financial products and services, you direct us to provide our partners with your credit data and other relevant information you provide as a way to match you with offers for financial products and services from those partners. Generally, we will display these offers when you access our web or mobile Services, but we will occasionally send you information on products, services, special deals, or promotions, by email or other electronic messaging
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may use third-party service providers or vendors to support or perform certain aspects of the Service or our business on our or your behalf, such as hosting the Service, designing or operating the Service’s features, tracking the Service’s analytics, providing data used, directly or indirectly, in connection with the Service, marketing or advertising the Service, enabling Evolution Finance to contact you with offers or performing other administrative services. We may provide these third-party service providers or vendors with access to user information, including personal information, in connection with the services they are performing for you or for us. In connection with our Services, these third-party service providers or vendors may also set and access their own cookies, web beacons and embedded scripts on your device, and they may otherwise collect or have access to information about you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
We may offer sweepstakes, contests, and other promotions (each a "Promotion") through the Services or through social media or other channels. By participating in a Promotion, you are agreeing to official rules that govern that Promotion, which may contain specific requirements of you, including allowing the sponsor of the Promotion to use your name, voice and/or likeness in advertising or marketing associated with the Promotion.
While responding to subpoenas, court orders, legal processes, establishing or exercising our legal rights, or defending against legal claims if in our good faith opinion such action is required or permitted by law.
When we believe it is necessary to share information with law enforcement, government authorities or private parties to (a) protect our, your, or others’ rights, privacy, safety, or property (including by making and defending legal claims); (b) enforce the terms and conditions that govern the Service; or (c) protect, investigate, and deter against fraudulent, harmful, unauthorized, unethical, or illegal activity, including cyberattacks and identity theft.
After we have removed your name or any other personally identifying information from it, or have combined it with other people's data in a way that it is no longer associated with you.
We may share and transfer personal information with acquirers and other relevant participants in business transactions (or potential transactions) involving a corporate divestiture, merger, consolidation, acquisition, reorganization, sale or other disposition of all or any portion of the business or assets of, or equity interests in, Evolution Finance or our affiliates (including, in connection with a bankruptcy or similar proceedings).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may share and transfer personal information with acquirers and other relevant participants in business transactions (or potential transactions) involving a corporate divestiture, merger, consolidation, acquisition, reorganization, sale or other disposition of all or any portion of the business or assets of, or equity interests in, Evolution Finance or our affiliates (including, in connection with a bankruptcy or similar proceedings).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Advertisements\nEvolution Finance and its service providers and advertising partners display targeted advertisements, which are based upon personal information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Advertisements\nEvolution Finance and its service providers and advertising partners display targeted advertisements, which are based upon personal information
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may work with third-party advertising networks, marketing partners, publishers, and other entities ("Advertising Partners") to perform analytics and advertise our products and services on other online services not affiliated with us. In connection with these advertising services, we or our Advertising Partners, like Google, may use cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to collect behavioral information about how you use our site or other online services over time in order to perform tracking and marketing analytics or serve advertisements that are more likely to be of interest to you ("Interest-Based Advertisements").
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We may work with third-party advertising networks, marketing partners, publishers, and other entities ("Advertising Partners") to perform analytics and advertise our products and services on other online services not affiliated with us. In connection with these advertising services, we or our Advertising Partners, like Google, may use cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to collect behavioral information about how you use our site or other online services over time in order to perform tracking and marketing analytics or serve advertisements that are more likely to be of interest to you ("Interest-Based Advertisements").
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Biometric Information We Collect\nPolicy Statement: Evolution Finance collects certain biometric data from individuals.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Evolution Finance utilizes software with biometric technology ("Biometric Software") for identity verification and prevention of identity fraud.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Biometric Data Defined: For purposes of this section of our Privacy Policy, "biometric data" means personal information stored by us regarding an individual's physical characteristics that can be used to identify a person, such as fingerprints, voiceprints, facial shape, or scan of hand or face geometry. Biometric data includes "biometric identifiers" and "biometric information."\n\n"Biometric identifier" means a retina or iris scan, fingerprint, voiceprint, or scan of hand or face geometry. Biometric identifiers do not include writing samples, written signatures, photographs, human biological samples used for valid scientific testing or screening, demographic data, tattoo descriptions, or physical descriptions such as height, weight, hair color, or eye color. Biometric identifiers do not include information captured from a patient in a health care setting or information collected, used, or stored for health care treatment, payment, or operations under the federal Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Biometric information does not include information derived from items or procedures excluded under the definition of biometric identifiers.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Purpose for Collection of Biometric Data: Evolution Finance, our vendors, and/or the licensor of Evolution Finance's Biometric Software collect, store, and uses biometric data for individual identification, and fraud prevention. An individual's biometric data is collected, stored, and used while the individual is an account holder of Evolution Finance, pursuant to the retention schedule provided below.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Purpose for Collection of Biometric Data: Evolution Finance, our vendors, and/or the licensor of Evolution Finance's Biometric Software collect, store, and uses biometric data for individual identification, and fraud prevention
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Evolution Finance, our vendors, and/or the licensor of Evolution Finance's software will not sell, lease, trade, or otherwise profit from an individuals' biometric data; provided, however, the Company's vendors and the licensor of the Company's software may be paid for products or services used by the Company that utilize such biometric data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Evolution Finance, our vendors, and/or the licensor of Evolution Finance's software will not sell, lease, trade, or otherwise profit from an individuals' biometric data; provided, however, the Company's vendors and the licensor of the Company's software may be paid for products or services used by the Company that utilize such biometric data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold
Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Changes to this Privacy Policy\nEvolution Finance may update this policy at any time without notice to you. Changes or additions to this Privacy Policy will be available in this section of the website. You can always come to this section to learn what information we gather, how we might use that information and whether we will disclose it to anyone. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you here, by email, or by means of a notice on our home page and update the date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: The right to confirm whether or not we are processing your personal data and to access such personal data;
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: The right to delete personal data that we collected from and/or about you, subject to certain exceptions;
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: The right to correct inaccurate personal data that we maintain about you, subject to certain exceptions;
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: The right, if applicable, to opt out of the processing of your personal data for purposes of (1) targeted advertising; (2) the "sale" of your personal data (as that term is defined by applicable law); and (3) profiling in furtherance of decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects concerning you;
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: The right not to receive discriminatory treatment by us for the exercise of your privacy rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Although we do not "sell" personal data in the conventional sense, i.e., for money, we use interest-based advertising cookies and tracking technologies to display advertisements about our products to you on nonaffiliated websites, applications, and online services. This is "targeted advertising" under applicable privacy laws. When we engage in those activities, we "sell" personal data (i.e., information from cookies) to third-party advertisers and analytics companies.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold
